name: Scandinavian Design Philosophy
description: Scandinavian design emphasizes functionality, minimalism, and creating cozy, comfortable environments.

principles.name: Hygge
principles.description: Creating cozy, comfortable, and content atmosphere
principles.application: Warm lighting, soft textures, intimate gathering spaces

principles.name: Lagom
principles.description: The perfect balance - not too little, not too much
principles.application: Balanced proportions, moderate luxury, sustainable choices

principles.name: Funktionalism
principles.description: Form follows function in beautiful, practical design
principles.application: Multi-purpose furniture, clean lines, practical beauty

guidelines: Use light, natural colors to combat darkness
Incorporate natural materials like wood and wool
Use warm lighting to create atmosphere
